name: gogogo
description:
This is a fast paced casual game. The game screen is simple and exquisite, very test the player's reaction speed and agility, suitable for all ages. In the game, players operate characters constantly running, facing different obstacles to choose different directions to avoid.
Game characteristics
1. Simple games
2. Visual embodiment of three-dimensional sense
Gameplay rules
WAD (keyboard) manipulates the character to move and avoid obstacles in time. When you fail to avoid obstacles, the game fails.
Game highlights
1. The picture, the painting style is quite cool
2. Music, the rhythm is very strong
3. Operation, smooth and smooth without delay
